name: mainland
content:

relating to or forming the main part of a country or continent, not including the islands around it: mainland China Hawaii's cost of living is estimated at about 20 percent to 30 percent higher than most mainland communities.
More examplesFewer examplesThe number of cars on mainland roads-about 20 million-is expected to increase by 2.5 million this year alone.This has been encouraged by developments in the international financial markets and by French aspirations to establish Paris as mainland Europe's prime financial centre.About 40 percent of the polar bear dens on the mainland coast of the Beaufort Sea are in the area proposed for oil exploration.
